column4: when i click to configure my card its also only giving me one option for what to do w/ them where it usually said sep. X, clone, twinview.... its only saying sep. x the others are grayed out.  This may be due to it not realizing I have another monitor but I'm not sure
i have that card and installed the driver from nvidia 190.42 (has overscan slider for tv). it works great
where you having the same issue i spoke of?
for some reason i had a lot of problems with the 180 and 185 driver the new one fixed it
did you say that you downloaded an alpha version or was it actual release. 190 was released 10-27

ok good luck let me know how it goes
bad news.. i put the new driver in but its still not detecting the other monitor.. :-\  any clue?
did you turn off the computer then hook up the second monitor?
hey sorry if i missed you.. PM me plz .. i could use help
